title: Our
Core
Values
community.description: We make it a necessity to ensure DATABRANDS empowers you to own your digital destiny with performance, privacy, and power.

freeAndOpenSource.title: Creator First
freeAndOpenSource.description: DATABRANDS puts the creator first, ensuring you own your data, your audience, and your creative output.

simpleYetPowerful.title: Simple yet Deep
simpleYetPowerful.description: DATABRANDS is intuitive for beginners, but offers depth and programmability for power users and agencies.

privateAndAlwaysUpToDate.title: Private and Secure
privateAndAlwaysUpToDate.description: Your strategies and unreleased content are yours. DATABRANDS is built with privacy-first architecture.

about.title: About DATABRANDS
about.description:
At DATABRANDS, we believe that your digital presence is more than just metrics‚Äîit's an extension of your creative soul. in a world obsessed with algorithms and engagement traps, we are building a sanctuary for creators who want to reclaim their time and their voice.

We started this journey with a simple question: What if social media management felt less like a chore and more like an art form? What if your tools didn't just track numbers, but actually understood the vibe you're trying to curate?

DATABRANDS is our answer. It is a declaration of independence from the chaos of the attention economy. We are not just building software; illustration of a new way to work‚Äîone where privacy, performance, and power coexist. We are a small, dedicated team of dreamers and doers who refuse to compromise on quality or ethics. We in transparency, and in the power of the community. 

Whether you are a solo creator just starting out or a seasoned brand manager scaling an empire, DATABRANDS is designed to be your steadfast companion. We are here to help you cut through the noise, focus on what matters, and build something that truly lasts. Welcome to the future of brand management. Welcome to DATABRANDS.

mainTeam.description: Building the future of brand management.

securityNotice.title: Verified & Secure Downloads
securityNotice.description: All DATABRANDS downloads are signed and verified for your security. We recommend downloading directly from our official website or GitHub repository. If your download seems broken or gets flagged by your antivirus, please report it to us.

platformDescriptions.mac:
Works on both new Apple (M-Series) and older Intel Macs.
Requires macOS 11.0 or later.
platformDescriptions.windows:
Works on Windows 10 and Windows 11.
Not sure which version to get? Most people should choose the 64-bit installer.
platformDescriptions.linux:
Works with many Linux versions.
Pick the download that matches your system.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.body: Welcome to DATABRANDS! Your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy outlines the types of personal information we collect, how we use it, and the steps we take to protect your data when you use DATABRANDS.
introduction.summary: We don't sell data - We don't collect data - We don't track you

noCollect.title: 1. Information We Do Not Collect
noCollect.body: DATABRANDS is designed with privacy in mind. We do not collect, store, or share any of your personal data. Here's what that means:

noTelemetry.title: 1.1. No Telemetry
noTelemetry.body: We do not collect any telemetry data or crash reports.
noTelemetry.body2: DATABRANDS has stripped out telemetry. We have removed all telemetry data collection and crash reports.

noPersonalData.title: 1.2. No Personal Data Collection
noPersonalData.body: DATABRANDS does not collect any personal information such as your IP address, browsing history, search queries, or form data.

noThirdParty.title: 1.3. No Third-Party Tracking
noThirdParty.body: We do not allow third-party trackers or analytics tools to operate within DATABRANDS. Your activity remains entirely private.

externalConnections.title: 1.4. External connections made at startup
externalConnections.body: DATABRANDS may make external connections at startup to check for updates and ensure the system is up to date on plugins, addons, check for connectivity and Geolocation/push notifications services. We do not collect any data from these connections, but they may be logged by third-party services or websites you visit.

localStorage.title: 2. Information Stored Locally on Your Device

browsingData.title: 2.1. Local Data
browsingData.body: DATABRANDS stores certain data locally on your device to enhance your experience. This includes:

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: Cookies are stored locally on your device and are not shared with DATABRANDS or any third party. You have full control over the management of cookies through the settings.

cache.title: Cache and Temporary Files
cache.body: DATABRANDS may store cache files and other temporary data locally to improve performance. These files can be cleared at any time through the settings.

settings.title: 2.2. Settings and Preferences
settings.body: Any customizations, settings, and preferences you make within DATABRANDS are stored locally on your device. We do not have access to or control over this data.

sync.title: 3. Sync Feature
sync.body: DATABRANDS offers a "Sync" feature. This feature allows you to synchronize your bookmarks, history, passwords, and other data across multiple devices. For this feature to work, your data is encrypted and stored on secure servers and is treated in accordance with strict Privacy Policy. We, at DATABRANDS, cannot view any of this data.
sync.link2: This is how we store your passwords

addons.title: 4. Add-ons and "Plugins"
addons.body:
You can install Add-ons. DATABRANDS periodically checks for updates to these Add-ons.
You can also install "Plugins" from our library. These Plugins are hosted by our services and follow the same privacy policy our website. We do not collect any data from these Plugins, they are purely static content that is downloaded to your device.

security.title: 5. Data Security
security.body: Although DATABRANDS does not collect your data, we are committed to protecting the information that is stored locally on your device. We recommend that you use secure passwords, enable device encryption, and regularly update your software to ensure your data remains safe.
security.note: Note that we prioritize security at every level.

control.title: 6. Your Control
control.deletionBody: You have full control over all data stored locally on your device by DATABRANDS. You can clear your data, cookies, and cache at any time using the settings.

website.title: 7. Our Website and Services
website.body: DATABRANDS's website and services do not use any third-party analytics, tracking, or CDN services. We do not collect any personal information from users visiting our website.
website.externalLinksBody: DATABRANDS may contain links to external websites or services that are not owned or operated by us. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these sites. We recommend that you review the privacy policies of these sites before providing them with any personal information.

changes.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.body: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes by updating the effective date at the top of this policy. Continued use of DATABRANDS after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

otherTelemetry.title: 9. Other telemetry
otherTelemetry.body: We try to disable all telemetry data collection in DATABRANDS.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or DATABRANDS, please contact us at:

notFound.title: Page Not Found
